de.hohenheim.view.mobile

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hohenheim.view.mobile.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to help calculate paths, distances and more.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arthur Kaul, Besim Gashi, Mathias Zwiesele, Daniel Intili, Bernd Hofs‰ﬂ

      • getDistance

        public static double getDistance(PathFigure path)
        Calculates the distance value on the path between the start room and the end room.
        Parameters:
        {@link - PathFigure} path - the path we want to have the length.
        Returns:
        double distance

      • getNextNode

        public static NodeFigure getNextNode(PathFigure path,
                     NodeFigure start)
        Determines the room at the end of the path regarding the start room which we pass as parameter.
        Parameters:
        {@link - PathFigure} path - The path where we want to have the end room.
        {@link - NodeFigure} start - The start room.
        Returns:
        NodeFigure room - the room which is at the other end of the path regarding the start room.

      • hasEdge

        public static boolean hasEdge(java.util.HashMap<NodeFigure,java.util.ArrayList<PathFigure>> paths,
              NodeFigure start,
              NodeFigure end)
        We want to determine if there exists a edge between two rooms.
        Parameters:
        {@link - HashMap} paths - The HashMap with all paths of all rooms
        start - - The start room.
        end - - The end room.
        Returns:
        boolean - true when a path between the two nodes exist.

      • getRoute

        public static java.util.Iterator<NodeFigure> getRoute(NodeMap map,
                                      NodeFigure start,
                                      NodeFigure end)
        Calculates a route between two rooms. this algorithm is quite simple and does not optimize the route (no shortest paths).
        Parameters:
        {@link - NodeMap} map - The RoomMap where the rooms are located.
        {@link - NodeFigure} start - The start room where the calculation begins.
        {@link - NodeFigure} end - The end room where the calculation should stop.
        Returns:
        Iterator with all RoomFigures (NodeFigure) which mark the route.

      • getRoute

                                       java.util.HashMap<NodeFigure,java.util.ArrayList<PathFigure>> paths,
                                       NodeFigure start,
                                       NodeFigure end)
        This method is a helper and makes recursion.
